beans:list.beans:value: SELECT pname, s.name as sprint, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(s.START_DATE/1000), '%m/%d/%y %h:%m') as startdate, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(s.END_DATE/1000), '%m/%d/%y %h:%m') as enddate, round(sum(wl.timeworked)/60/60,2) as timeworked FROM jiradb.jiraissue i JOIN jiradb.project p ON (p.ID = i.project) JOIN jiradb.worklog wl ON (wl.issueid = i.ID) JOIN jiradb.ao_60db71_sprint s ON (s.start_date <= unix_timestamp(wl.startdate) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(wl.startdate) * 1000 <= ifnull(s.COMPLETE_DATE,s.END_DATE)) WHERE p.id = ? GROUP BY pname, s.name;

SELECT s.name as sprint, wl.author as author, round(wl.timeworked/60/60,2) as timeworked, wl.startdate as date FROM jiradb.jiraissue i JOIN jiradb.project p ON (p.ID = i.project) JOIN jiradb.worklog wl ON (wl.issueid = i.ID) JOIN jiradb.ao_60db71_sprint s ON (s.start_date <= unix_timestamp(wl.startdate) * 1000 AND unix_timestamp(wl.startdate) * 1000 <= ifnull(s.COMPLETE_DATE,s.END_DATE)) WHERE p.id = ? AND (s.name LIKE ifnull(?,'%')) AND (wl.author LIKE ifnull(?,'%')) ORDER BY s.name, startdate;
